author: Juha Haataja
content:
I was going to comment on the beautiful colors despite the rainy weather, but then the comment on sad and lonely bikes derailed me.

I haven't felt that the bicycles are lonely, but perhaps some of them are. What I have usually felt is that they are patiently waiting to be on the way again, or deep in thoughts looking at the surroundings.

I'm still derailed and not able to explain this too well... The comment changed my wordview (well, a little bit).
